Created: May. 15th, 2009

Tags:

 

  • What is List Central?

    List Central is a social, online community and utility for people who love lists. You can keep build task-oriented lists to keep yourself organized, or get inspired and build creative lists of all kinds.

    You can choose to keep your lists private, or make them public and share them with the rest of the List Central community.

    If people like your list, you could find it featured on the front page of List Central among the most popular lists on the site.

    That's right - building cool lists will gain you instant list-building street-cred.

  • What kind of lists can I make?

    One of the best things about List Central is that there are no limits! List Central's flexible interface allows you to create a wide range of lists.

    List Central lets you spice up all of your lists. Each list item you create can include links, images or even your favourite products from the Amazon catalogue.

    • To Do Lists
    • Wish Lists
    • Top 10 Lists
    • New Years Resolutions

    You are only limited by your imagination.

  • I have a pen and a piece of paper. Why do I need this fandangled device called "List Central"?

    We all have random grocery lists and to-do notes scattered around our homes. Sometimes, those lists stray and we spend more time trying to remember where we left them, than actually reading them, which defeats the purpose of having them in the first place.

    List Central provides a centralized location to create, store and access all of your lists. You will never have to worry about remembering where you left your lists!

    You can access List Central from anywhere you have an internet connection, at any time. With the advances in mobile phone technology, you could easily access your grocery list in the store, from the comfort of your mobile phone.

    Another advantage that List Central has over pen and paper is the a community of list fanatics. Every time you build a jaw-dropping top ten, or a thought provoking best-of, there will be other list lovers ready to rate and comment on your list, for instant feedback; just try and do that with the traditional "pen and paper" approach!

  • I have some suggestions. Where can I send them?

    We would love to hear your feedback about List Central. We aim to build List Central into something that its users love! Feel free to contact us via this web form.
